#21 0' 6.8"
396.83 lbs. 		Woolly Crab Pokémon It aimed for the top but got lost and ended up on a snowy mountain. Being forced to endure the cold, this Pokémon evolved and grew thick fur.

Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Hyper Cutter 2 The Pokémon's pride of its pincers prevents other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.
1 Iron Fist 7 Powers up punching moves.
18 Scrappy 6 The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.
36 Bare Hands 6 Boosts the base power of the Pokémon's attacks if they are not holding an item.
54 Rivalry 3 Deals more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but less to those of the opposite gender.
72 Unseen Fist 8 Moves that make direct contact can attack the target even if the target protects itself.
90 Technician 8 Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.
100 Skill Link 8 Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 08 Trace 6 When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon's Ability.
Disc 10 Water Veil 4 The Pokémon is covered with a water veil, which prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
Disc 23 Frostproof 6 The Pokémon resists Ice-type moves and damage from frostbite.
Disc 25 Super Luck 5 The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.
Disc 41 Limber 4 Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Analytic 6 Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.
Anger Point 7 The Pokémon is angered when it takes a critical hit, and that maxes its Attack stat.
Anticipation 3 The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon's dangerous moves.
Bare Hands 6 Boosts the base power of the Pokémon's attacks if they are not holding an item.
Berserk 6 Boosts its Sp. Atk stat when it takes a hit that causes its HP to become half or less.
Cold-Blooded 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
Combatize 8 Normal-type moves become Fighting-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Competitive 7 Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat is lowered.
Defeatist -2 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Frisk 5 When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon's held item.
Guts 6 It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.
Hustle 7 Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.
Hyper Cutter 2 The Pokémon's pride of its pincers prevents other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.
Inner Focus 3 The Pokémon's intensely focused, and that protects the Pokémon from flinching.
Iron Fist 7 Powers up punching moves.
Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Mimicry 3 Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
Mold Breaker 9 Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.
Pressure 6 By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.
Quick Draw 7 Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.
Rivalry 3 Deals more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but less to those of the opposite gender.
Scrappy 6 The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.
Sheer Force 9 Removes additional effects to increase the power of moves when attacking.
Shell Armor 2 A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
Skill Link 8 Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.
Slow Start -5 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Stall -2 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Stalwart 2 Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.
Stamina 7 Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.
Steadfast 2 The Pokémon's determination boosts the Speed stat each time the Pokémon flinches.
Technician 8 Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Unseen Fist 8 Moves that make direct contact can attack the target even if the target protects itself.
Arctic Surge 9 Turns the ground into Arctic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Combat Surge 9 Turns the ground into Combat Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Ice Body 4 The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.
Ice Scales 7 The Pokémon is protected by ice scales, which halve the damage taken from special moves.
Refrigerate 8 Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Sleet Spit 5 The Pokémon generates a hailstorm when it's hit by an attack.
Slush Rush 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.
Snow Cloak 6 Boosts evasiveness in a hailstorm.
Thermal Exchange 6 Boosts the Attack stat when hit by a Fire-type move. The Pokémon also cannot be burned.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
